error.message: An error...? what happened... where are we?

errors.bgFetchFailed: Couldn't get the background panorama... Maybe your device has lost access to the internet.
errors.postFetchFailed: Couldn't get post... Maybe your device has lost access to the Internet.
errors.postRenderFailed: Couldn't render body of post "{name}"... Please report this on the site's GitHub.
errors.postsFetchFailed: Couldn't get posts... Maybe your device has lost access to the Internet.

doNotScrollPanorama.info: Disables panorama scrolling, may be beneficial for people on a low-end device.
doNotScrollPanorama.title: Disable background animation

noSleep.info: Makes animations and other tasks not sleep. NOTE: May break loading text in some places.
noSleep.title: Use fast animations

useLightMode.info: Uses light mode instead of dark mode.
useLightMode.title: Use Light Mode
